```{r}

require(ggplot2)
library(ggplot2)

finalProject<-read.csv('c:/temp/SFSalries-Cleaned.csv',header=TRUE)
finalProject100Rows<-read.csv('c:/temp/SFSalaries-sliced100Rows.csv',header=TRUE)
summary(finalProject)
str(finalProject)
str(finalProject100Rows)

```

```{r}
#### Chunck 2 in R Studie is about ALL Numeric colum boxplots. Box Plots for Base Pay, OvertimePay, OtherPay #### and TotalPay+Benefits

boxplot(finalProject$BasePay)
hist(finalProject$BasePay)

boxplot(finalProject$OvertimePay)
hist(finalProject$OvertimePay)

boxplot(finalProject$OtherPay)
hist(finalProject$OtherPay)

boxplot(finalProject$TotalPay)
hist(finalProject$TotalPay)

boxplot(finalProject$TotalPayBenefits)
hist(finalProject$TotalPayBenefits)

```

```{r}

x1<-finalProject$Year
y1<-finalProject$BasePay
plot(x1,y1, main="Scatter Plot of SF Salries of DATA", xlab="Year", ylab="Base Pay",)

x1<-finalProject$Year
y1<-finalProject$TotalPay
plot(x1,y1, main="Scatter Plot of SF Salries of DATA", xlab="Year", ylab="Total Pay",)

x1<-finalProject$Year
y1<-finalProject$TotalPayBenefits
plot(x1,y1, main="Scatter Plot of SF Salries of DATA", xlab="Year", ylab="Total Pay + Benefits",)

```
